name: omg-monorepo
description: OpenAPI Markdown Grammar (OMG) - A human-first domain-specific language for API specification
author: mcclowes

scripts.build: npm run build -w omg-parser && npm run build -w omg-compiler && npm run build -w omg-linter && npm run build -w omg-lsp && npm run build -w omg-md-cli
scripts.publish:all: npm publish -w omg-parser && npm publish -w omg-linter && npm publish -w omg-compiler && npm publish -w omg-lsp && npm publish -w omg-md-cli
